segments.text: Today is my wife's birthday , so I want to buy a bouquet for her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of flowers do you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about rose ? It's the most suitable one for lovers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what about violet ? It means the eternal beauty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks good . Pack me a bouquet of violet , please .
segments.speaker: S2
